I am confident that this investment will yield significant returns and satisfaction for you. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,050,000.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,050,000
